book.synopsis: Using selections from her works and memoirs of people who knew her, presents the thoughts of Laura Ingalls Wilder on the proper conduct of young women.
book.title_long: Writings to Young Women from Laura Ingalls Wilder: On Wisdom And Virtues
book.dimensions: Height: 7.5 Inches, Length: 5.25 Inches, Weight: 0.5 Pounds, Width: 0.75 Inches
